trans-unit.source: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um iterador em um conjunto de nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> classe não está posicionada no primeiro nó em um conjunto de nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class must be made to position the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object on the first node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe deve ser feita para posicionar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto no primeiro nó no conjunto de nós selecionado.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>, if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>, se você editar o nó atual ou qualquer um de seus predecessores, sua posição atual será perdida.

trans-unit.source: If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> array, copy all of the nodes from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser editar um número de nós de que você selecionou, crie um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> de matriz, copie todos os nós do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> na matriz, em seguida, iterar por meio da matriz e modificar os nós.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para iterar sobre uma <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> coleção usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe.

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Uma maneira é usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método e, em seguida, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> obter atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instância, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Outra maneira é usar um `foreach` loop para chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método e o uso retornado <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface ao enumerar os nós, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> ou use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinar essas duas abordagens pode causar resultados inesperados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método é chamado pela primeira vez e, em seguida, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método é chamado no `foreach` loop, o `foreach` loop não será iniciado ao enumerar os resultados do início da coleção, mas de posição após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to select a node set using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> classe para selecionar um nó definido usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> class, you must override the following members:
trans-unit.target: Quando você herda o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> classe, você deve substituir os seguintes membros:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelos construtores de classe derivada para inicializar o estado nesse tipo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna um clone deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object clone of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo clone do objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> o objeto é posicionado no mesmo nó no nó definido se foram feitas chamadas para o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is not affected by subsequent changes to this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: O clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto não é afetado por alterações subsequentes a esse <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do último nó no conjunto de nós selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: O índice do último nó no conjunto de nós ou 0 se não houver nenhum nó selecionado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> propriedade não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />, positioned on the current context node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> dpara este <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />, posicionado no nó do contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> posicionado no nó de contexto do qual o conjunto de nós foi selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext" /> method must be called to move the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> to the first node in the selected set.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext" /> deve ser chamado para mover a <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> para o primeiro nó no conjunto selecionado.

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties of the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object to obtain information on the current node.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar as propriedades de retornado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto para obter informações sobre o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: However, the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, retornado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto não deve ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object cannot be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto não pode ser movido para fora do conjunto de nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can clone the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode clonar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object can then be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: O clonado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto, em seguida, pode ser movido para fora do conjunto de nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This method of cloning the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object might affect the performance of the XPath query.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de clonagem de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objeto pode afetar o desempenho da consulta XPath.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> methods result in no nodes being selected, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property might not be pointing to the context node.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> métodos resultam em nenhum nó selecionado, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> propriedade não pode estar apontando para o nó de contexto.

trans-unit.source: To test whether nodes have been selected, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Para testar se nós selecionados, use o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> propriedade conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém todos os títulos de livro criados usando Herman Melville o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `contosoBooks.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o índice da posição atual no conjunto de nós selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the current position.
trans-unit.target: O índice da posição atual.

trans-unit.source: The index is 1-based.
trans-unit.target: O índice é baseado em 1.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the first node has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o primeiro nó tem um índice de 1.

trans-unit.source: An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um índice de 0 indica que não há nenhum nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna um número inteiro positivo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para iterar pelo conjunto de nós selecionado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para iterar pelo conjunto de nós selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador está posicionado na posição atual do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objeto.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para iterar sobre uma <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> coleção usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe.

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Uma maneira é usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método e, em seguida, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> obter atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instância, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Outra maneira é usar um `foreach` loop para chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método e o uso retornado <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface ao enumerar os nós, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> ou use o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinar essas duas abordagens pode causar resultados inesperados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método é chamado pela primeira vez e, em seguida, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método é chamado no `foreach` loop, o `foreach` loop não será iniciado ao enumerar os resultados do início da coleção, mas de posição após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object returned by the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current" /> property to the next node in the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, move o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> retornado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current" /> para o nó seguinte no conjunto de nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object moved to the next node; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> for movido para o nó seguinte; <see langword="false" /> se não houver mais nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> o objeto é posicionado no primeiro nó no nó selecionado definido somente após a chamada inicial para o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The node set is created in document order.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de nós é criado na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method moves to the next node in document order.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, ao chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método Move para o próximo nó na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para iterar sobre uma <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> coleção usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe.

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Uma maneira é usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método e, em seguida, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> obter atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instância, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Outra maneira é usar um `foreach` loop para chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método e o uso retornado <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface ao enumerar os nós, como no exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> ou use o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinar essas duas abordagens pode causar resultados inesperados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método é chamado pela primeira vez e, em seguida, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> método é chamado no `foreach` loop, o `foreach` loop não será iniciado ao enumerar os resultados do início da coleção, mas de posição após o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to select a node set using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> classe para selecionar um nó definido usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xml` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto que é uma cópia da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto que é uma cópia dessa instância.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.ICloneable>.
